cab.content: HIS DOCUMENT 13 THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITAHNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT),OaPIDKMTIAL.;.P. 339 (24) .CABINET.if, . ^7BRITISH EMPIRE EXHIBITION. ' Note by the Secretary. The Executive of the British Empire Exhibitionhave asked me to say that they would be very pleasedif the Members of the Cabinet would lunch with them at Wembley In about three weeks or a month's time.Any date convenient to the Cabinet would suit theExecutive of the Exhibition. It is proposed, subject to the Prime Minister'approval, to raise the question at the next meeting ofthe Cabinet on June 18th. (Signed) M.P.A. HANKY, Secretary to the Cabinet.2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W..l0 5th June, 1924.
